benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client

Class CrimeMonthHistogramFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimeMonthHistogramFragment

  • public class CrimeMonthHistogramFragment
extends Fragment
    CrimeMonthHistogramFragment is a UI fragment class used to display the crime count monthly histogram.

    The crime count monthly histogram is a histogram recording the number of committed crimes per each month of a given crime data interval.

    The histogram is displayed horizontally as a series of vertical columns views. CrimeMonthHistogramObservationView is used as a column view class.

    Each column view contains a colored bar and a label. The label contains the number of committed crimes. The height of the bar is in proportion to the displayed number of committed crimes. The columns are colored in such a way, that all the columns displaying the data for a month in the particular year share the same color.

    Author:
    Tom
    See Also:
    CrimeMonthHistogramObservationView, CrimeMonthHistogramObservation
